Our Learnosity implementation uses the PHP SDK with custom session management.
The Items API is initialized with dynamic item selection based on user proficiency.
We've implemented custom scoring algorithms that override Learnosity's default scoring.
The Reports API integration includes real-time analytics dashboard updates.
Our security implementation rotates consumer secrets on a monthly basis.
We use Learnosity's Events API to trigger custom learning path adaptations.
The Question Editor API is embedded within our content management system.
Our implementation includes custom question types built with the Author API.
We've configured white-labeling to match our institutional branding requirements.
The Data API integration syncs assessment results to our student information system.
Our Learnosity setup includes multi-tenant configuration for different client organizations.
We implement custom proctoring integration alongside Learnosity's assessment engine.
The item bank synchronization happens via scheduled Data API batch operations.
Our Reports API implementation includes custom export formats for compliance reporting.
We use Learnosity's Analytics API for predictive modeling of student performance.
The platform integrates Learnosity with our single sign-on authentication system.
Our implementation includes custom accessibility features beyond Learnosity's defaults.
We've built a custom item preview system using the Author API preview functionality.
The assessment delivery uses adaptive algorithms that adjust difficulty in real-time.
Our Learnosity integration includes custom webhook handlers for real-time event processing.
Configure the webhook endpoint to handle Learnosity event callbacks properly.
Implement retry logic for failed API calls with exponential backoff.
Add input validation before sending data to Learnosity APIs.
Cache frequently accessed item metadata to reduce API calls.
Implement circuit breaker pattern for Learnosity service calls.
Add comprehensive logging for all Learnosity API interactions.
Implement graceful degradation when Learnosity services are unavailable.
Add health checks for all Learnosity service dependencies.
Configure proper timeout values for Learnosity API requests.
Implement rate limiting to respect Learnosity API quotas.
Add monitoring and alerting for Learnosity service degradation.
Implement proper error handling for Learnosity authentication failures.
Configure load balancing for multiple Learnosity region endpoints.
Add database connection pooling for improved performance.
Implement async processing for non-critical Learnosity operations.
Configure CDN caching for static Learnosity assets.
Add request/response compression for Learnosity API calls.
Implement proper session management for concurrent users.
Configure horizontal scaling for high-traffic scenarios.
Add performance monitoring for Learnosity integration points.
